name: The Alchemist

description: An exploration of the history and impact of Homo sapiens.

description: A classic novel addressing racial injustice in the American South.

description: A science fiction masterpiece set in a distant future.

description: A beloved children's book about imagination and adventure.

description: A comprehensive guide to human anatomy for medical professionals.

description: A psychological thriller exploring the complexities of a marriage.

description: A classic play exploring themes of revenge and madness.
